So You really want to do this? Alright then, as You wish.
The requirements are as follows: You must be above level %MINLVL% to delevel, at least level %MINLVL% to use my other services and must have no more than %KARMA% Karma, otherwise I won't help You. You are now level %LEVEL%, which means decreasing 1 level will cost You %PRICE1% Adena. Your Vitality level is %VITLVL%, decreasing 1 level of Vitality will cost you %PRICE2% Adena. And lastly, to %TOGGLE% Experience gain, you will have to pay %PRICE3% Adena.
